name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
summary_text: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

name: On the Road
summary_text: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

name: Pink
summary_text: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

name: Fist Fight
summary_text: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.

name: Rockstar
summary_text: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

name: Togo
summary_text: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run yet was considered by most to be too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

name: The Towering Inferno
summary_text: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

name: Sleeper
summary_text: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

name: Vicky Donor
summary_text: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

name: Fiddler on the Roof
summary_text: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

name: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
summary_text: Tensions rise when trailblazing blues singer Ma Rainey and her band gather at a recording studio in Chicago in 1927.

name: All About Steve
summary_text: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.

name: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
summary_text: Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.

name: The Curse of La Llorona
summary_text: Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother suspected of child endangerment, a social worker and her own small kids are soon drawn into a frightening supernatural realm.

name: American Animals
summary_text: Four young men mistake their lives for a movie and attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history.

name: Welcome to the Sticks
summary_text: A French public servant from Provence is banished to the far North. Strongly prejudiced against this cold and inhospitable place, he leaves his family behind to relocate temporarily there, with the firm intent to quickly come back.

name: Down with Love
summary_text: In 1962 New York City, love blossoms between a playboy journalist and a feminist advice author.

name: Prime
summary_text: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

name: Mientras duermes
summary_text: You wake day after day to the comfort and security of your home. But how safe is it really?

name: High Crimes
summary_text: High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who she thought was Tom Kubik, is arrested and is revealed to be Ron Chapman. Chapman is on trial for a...                See full summary »

name: Talaash
summary_text: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

name: Wolf Children
summary_text: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
summary_text: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

name: Dolores Claiborne
summary_text: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.

name: Whale Rider
summary_text: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

name: The Spanish Apartment
summary_text: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

name: The Broken Circle Breakdown
summary_text: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

name: Nick of Time
summary_text: An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

name: The Green Inferno
summary_text: A group of student activists travels to the Amazon to save the rain forest and soon discover that they are not alone, and that no good deed goes unpunished.

name: Dragged Across Concrete
summary_text: Once two overzealous cops get suspended from the force, they must delve into the criminal underworld to get their proper compensation.

name: The Zookeeper's Wife
summary_text: Keepers of the Warsaw Zoo, Antonina and Jan Zabinski, must save hundreds of people and animals during the Nazi invasion in WWII Poland.

name: Camp X-Ray
summary_text: A soldier assigned to Guantanamo Bay befriends a man who has been imprisoned there.

name: Bad Lieutenant
summary_text: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption.

name: The Transporter Refueled
summary_text: In the south of France, former special-ops mercenary Frank Martin enters into a game of chess with a femme-fatale and her three sidekicks who are looking for revenge against a sinister Russian kingpin.

name: Driven
summary_text: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

name: It's a Boy Girl Thing
summary_text: Sworn enemies find themselves in each other's bodies, and use this to ruin each other's lives.

name: Bastille Day
summary_text: A young pickpocket and an unruly CIA agent team up on an anti-terrorist mission in France.

name: Qu'est-ce qu'on a fait au Bon Dieu?
summary_text: A Catholic French couple sees their life upside down when their four daughters get married to men of different religion and origins.

name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
summary_text: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body once and for all, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer once again seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can defeat him.

name: The Medallion
summary_text: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

name: Silverado
summary_text: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

name: Seed of Chucky
summary_text: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent gender-confused daughter, Glenda, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

name: Om Shanti Om
summary_text: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

name: Anonymous
summary_text: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

name: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
summary_text: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

name: Rumble in the Bronx
summary_text: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

name: The Gunman
summary_text: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

name: Fantasy Island
summary_text: When the owner and operator of a luxurious island invites a collection of guests to live out their most elaborate fantasies in relative seclusion, chaos quickly descends.

name: American Honey
summary_text: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

name: Another 48 Hrs.
summary_text: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond - this time to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

name: The Hidden Face
summary_text: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But, can he look beyond the facts?

name: The Tall Man
summary_text: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.

name: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
summary_text: Mel Brooks ' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

name: Black Sheep
summary_text: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

name: The Horse Whisperer
summary_text: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

name: Porky's
summary_text: In 1954, a group of Florida high-school guys try to help their buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seek revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.

name: Adventures in Babysitting
summary_text: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

name: The Fifth Estate
summary_text: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

name: The Boy Next Door
summary_text: A woman, separated from her unfaithful husband, falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

name: Night of the Living Dead
summary_text: When the unburied dead return to life and seek human victims, seven refugees seek shelter in a house in the Pennsylvanian countryside, but the group is at odds as to how they should deal with the situation.

name: Suffragette
summary_text: In 1912 London, a young working mother is galvanized into radical political activism supporting the right for women to vote, and is willing to meet violence with violence to achieve this end.

name: Money Train
summary_text: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

name: Beverly Hills Ninja
summary_text: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

name: The Rescuers Down Under
summary_text: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
summary_text: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

name: In & Out
summary_text: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

name: The Silence
summary_text: When the world is under attack from terrifying creatures who hunt their human prey by sound, 16-year old Ally Andrews (Kiernan Shipka), who lost her hearing at 13, and her family seek refuge in a remote haven.

name: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
summary_text: Ranch foreman Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

name: Red Sonja
summary_text: The fearless warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom from the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
summary_text: Kabir and Naina bond during a trekking trip. Before Naina can express herself, Kabir leaves India to pursue his career. They meet again years later, but he still cherishes his dreams more than bonds.

name: Coco Before Chanel
summary_text: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.

name: Lock Up
summary_text: With only six months left of his sentence, inmate Frank Leone is transferred from a minimum security prison to a maximum security prison by a vindictive warden.

name: Lovelace
summary_text: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband before taking control of her life.

name: Meet Dave
summary_text: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

name: Minari
summary_text: A Korean family starts a farm in 1980s Arkansas.

name: Death to Smoochy
summary_text: A kids show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids television isn't all child's play.

name: The Last Starfighter
summary_text: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

name: Saving Silverman
summary_text: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

name: Devdas
summary_text: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

name: Vishwaroopam
summary_text: When a classical dancer's suspecting wife sets an investigator behind him, a series of violent events are triggered, revealing his real identity and connection to a darker world.

name: Broken Embraces
summary_text: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.

name: Hustle & Flow
summary_text: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

name: The Stanford Prison Experiment
summary_text: In 1971, twenty-four male students are selected to take on randomly assigned roles of prisoners and guards in a mock prison situated in the basement of the Stanford psychology building.

name: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
summary_text: A tough police sergeant's overbearing mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.

name: The 100 Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared
summary_text: After living a long and colorful life, Allan Karlsson finds himself stuck in a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he leaps out a window and begins an unexpected journey.

name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
summary_text: In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

name: High-Rise
summary_text: Life for the residents of a tower block begins to run out of control.

name: The Joneses
summary_text: A seemingly perfect family moves into a suburban neighborhood, but when it comes to the truth as to why they're living there, they don't exactly come clean with their neighbors.

name: In a Better World
summary_text: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

name: Anon
summary_text: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security.

name: A.R.O.G
summary_text: Commander Logar fools Arif and sends him 1.000.000 years back in the time. He must civilize people from past to reach today.

name: Spread
summary_text: A sex comedy centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.

name: The Smurfs 2
summary_text: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.

name: Maps to the Stars
summary_text: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

name: Narc
summary_text: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

name: Cargo
summary_text: After an epidemic spreads all over Australia, a father searches for someone willing to protect his daughter.

name: Sea of Love
summary_text: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

name: Crossroads
summary_text: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

name: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
summary_text: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small town Wyoming as part of the Witness Protection Program.

name: Ra.One
summary_text: When the titular antagonist of an action game takes on physical form, it's only the game's less powerful protagonist who can save his creator's family.

name: Black Knight
summary_text: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

name: The Messengers
summary_text: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

name: The Party
summary_text: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

name: Secrets & Lies
summary_text: Following the death of her adoptive parents, a successful young black optometrist establishes contact with her biological mother -- a lonely white factory worker living in poverty in East London.

name: Would You Rather
summary_text: Desperate to help her ailing brother, a young woman unknowingly agrees to compete in a deadly game of "Would You Rather," hosted by a sadistic aristocrat.

name: Mighty Aphrodite
summary_text: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

name: Miracle in Cell No. 7
summary_text: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six year old daughter. Prison will be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie Miracle in Cell No. 7 (2013).

name: Double Impact
summary_text: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
summary_text: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

name: Aquamarine
summary_text: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

name: Sultan
summary_text: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

name: Presumed Innocent
summary_text: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

name: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
summary_text: A group of motorists hear about a crook's hidden stash of loot, and race against each other across the country to get to it.

name: Spies in Disguise
summary_text: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

name: Radio
summary_text: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

name: Tigerland
summary_text: A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.

name: Prince of Darkness
summary_text: A group of graduate students and scientists uncover an ancient canister in an abandoned church, but when they open the container, they inadvertently unleash a strange liquid and an evil force on all humanity.

name: Les Misérables
summary_text: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

name: Jules and Jim
summary_text: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

name: Halloween: Resurrection
summary_text: Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.

name: Two Lovers
summary_text: A Brooklyn-set romantic drama about a bachelor torn between the family friend his parents wish he would marry and his beautiful but volatile new neighbor.

name: Deadfall
summary_text: Two siblings decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.

name: The Water Horse
summary_text: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

name: The Holy Mountain
summary_text: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

name: Rings
summary_text: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.

name: License to Wed
summary_text: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

name: Cumali Ceber: Allah Seni Alsin
summary_text: Cumali Ceber goes to a vacation with his children.

name: Happy-Go-Lucky
summary_text: A look at a few chapters in the life of Poppy, a cheery, colorful, North London schoolteacher whose optimism tends to exasperate those around her.

name: 9½ Weeks
summary_text: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

name: The Professor and the Madman
summary_text: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid-19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.

name: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
summary_text: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

name: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
summary_text: An insurance investigator and an efficency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

name: Wasabi
summary_text: In Japan for the funeral of his long-lost love, a tough French detective learns that he also has a teenage daughter and that her life is in danger from the Yakuza.

name: Smolensk
summary_text: Inspired by true events of 2010 Polish Air Force Tu-154 mysterious crash in Smolensk, the film tells the fictional story of various people affected by the tragedy. The protagonist is a ...                See full summary »

name: The Day of the Jackal
summary_text: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

name: Hababam Sinifi
summary_text: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

name: Pieces of a Woman
summary_text: When a young mother's home birth ends in unfathomable tragedy, she begins a year-long odyssey of mourning that fractures relationships with loved ones in this deeply personal story of a woman learning to live alongside her loss.

name: Deception
summary_text: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

name: Charlotte's Web
summary_text: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

name: Inside
summary_text: Four months after the death of her husband, a woman on the brink of motherhood is tormented in her home by a strange woman who wants her unborn baby.

name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
summary_text: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

name: The Loved Ones
summary_text: When Brent turns down his classmate Lola's invitation to the prom, she concocts a wildly violent plan for revenge.

name: Lust, Caution
summary_text: During World War II era, a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

name: The Prince and Me
summary_text: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

name: Le Dîner de Cons
summary_text: A few friends have a weekly fools' dinner, where each brings a fool along. Pierre finds a champion fool for next dinner. Surprise.

name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
summary_text: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

name: Reindeer Games
summary_text: After assuming his dead cell-mate's identity to get with the other man's girlfriend, an ex-convict finds himself a reluctant participant in a casino heist.

name: The Railway Man
summary_text: A former British Army officer, who was tortured as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, discovers that the man responsible for much of his treatment is still alive and sets out to confront him.

name: Encino Man
summary_text: When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

name: The Transformers: The Movie
summary_text: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
summary_text: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

name: Romper Stomper
summary_text: A group of skinheads become alarmed at the way their neighbourhood is changing.

name: Basic Instinct 2
summary_text: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

name: JCVD
summary_text: Jean-Claude Van Damme gets involved in a bank robbery with hostages situation and reflects about his life during it.

name: In the Bedroom
summary_text: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

name: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
summary_text: In the aftermath of World War II, a writer forms an unexpected bond with the residents of Guernsey Island when she decides to write a book about their experiences during the war.

name: The Secret Garden
summary_text: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

name: Masters of the Universe
summary_text: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

name: Cleaner
summary_text: A former cop who now earns a wage as a crime scene cleaner unknowingly participates in a cover-up at his latest job.

name: Shane
summary_text: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

name: Left Behind
summary_text: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

name: Because I Said So
summary_text: A meddling mother tries to set her daughter up with the right man so her kid won't follow in her footsteps.

name: Whiteout
summary_text: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

name: Regression
summary_text: A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

name: Revenge
summary_text: Never take your mistress on an annual guys' getaway, especially one devoted to hunting - a violent lesson for three wealthy married men.

name: World's Greatest Dad
summary_text: When his son's body is found in a humiliating accident, a lonely high school teacher inadvertently attracts an overwhelming amount of community and media attention after covering up the truth with a phony suicide note.

name: Key Largo
summary_text: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

name: Southland Tales
summary_text: During a three-day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

name: Ingrid Goes West
summary_text: An unhinged social media stalker moves to LA and insinuates herself into the life of an Instagram star.

name: Next Friday
summary_text: A streetwise man flees South Central Los Angeles, heading to the suburbs and his lottery-winner uncle and cousin, to avoid a neighborhood thug with a grudge who has just escaped from prison.

name: Ngo si seoi
summary_text: A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

name: Sabrina
summary_text: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

name: The To Do List
summary_text: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.

name: The Ant Bully
summary_text: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his water gun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

name: Gallipoli
summary_text: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

name: Drunken Master
summary_text: Wong Fei-Hung (Jackie Chan) is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by Beggar So (Siu-Tin Yuen), a Master of drunken martial arts.

name: Brimstone
summary_text: From the moment the new reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows she and her family are in great danger.

name: Kill List
summary_text: Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.

name: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
summary_text: When Lou's shot in the groin, Nick and Jacob drag him in the Hot Tub Time Machine to go back in time and save Lou. The three end up 10 years in the future, where they need to go to find the shooter.

name: Small Time Crooks
summary_text: A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success.

name: Cube Zero
summary_text: A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.

name: Serenity
summary_text: A fishing boat captain juggles facing his mysterious past and finding himself ensnared in a reality where nothing is what it seems.

name: Black Sheep
summary_text: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

name: A Bittersweet Life
summary_text: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't proceed by his boss's orders.

name: Ravenous
summary_text: In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

name: Dead Calm
summary_text: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

name: The Perfection
summary_text: When troubled musical prodigy Charlotte seeks out Elizabeth, the new star pupil of her former school, the encounter sends both musicians down a sinister path with shocking consequences.

name: From Up on Poppy Hill
summary_text: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

name: Hearts in Atlantis
summary_text: Widowed Liz Garfield and her son Bobby change when mysterious stranger Ted Brautigan enters their lives.

name: Spun
summary_text: A drug dealer introduces one of his customers, a 'speed freak', to the man who runs the meth lab. A crazy three-day adventure ensues.

name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
summary_text: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

name: St. Elmo's Fire
summary_text: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

name: The Physician
summary_text: In Persia in the 11th Century, a surgeon's apprentice disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.

name: The Believer
summary_text: A young Jewish man develops a fiercely anti-Semitic philosophy. Based on the factual story of a K.K.K. member in the 1960s who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.

name: After.Life
summary_text: After a car accident, a young woman caught between life and death meets a funeral director who claims to have the gift of transitioning the dead into the afterlife.

name: The Good Son
summary_text: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and be friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

name: Personal Shopper
summary_text: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

name: Central Station
summary_text: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

name: The Hunter
summary_text: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.

name: Thoroughbreds
summary_text: Two upper-class teenage girls in suburban Connecticut rekindle their unlikely friendship after years of growing apart. Together, they hatch a plan to solve both of their problems-no matter what the cost.

name: Dragonfly
summary_text: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his deceased wife through his patients' near death experiences.

name: Wish I Was Here
summary_text: A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career.

name: Soul Kitchen
summary_text: In Hamburg, German-Greek chef Zinos unknowingly disturbs the peace in his locals-only restaurant by hiring a more talented chef.

name: Night School
summary_text: A group of high school dropouts are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.

name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
summary_text: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

name: The Rocker
summary_text: In the 1980s, a drummer is abandoned by his band just before they become rock superstars. Twenty years later, the drummer sees his second chance at stardom arise when he is asked to perform with his teenage nephew's high school rock band.

name: The Roommate
summary_text: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

name: Severance
summary_text: During a team-building retreat in the mountains a group of sales representatives are hunted down one by one.

name: Turistas
summary_text: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

name: Emma.
summary_text: In 1800s England, a well meaning but selfish young woman meddles in the love lives of her friends.

name: Land of Mine
summary_text: In post-World War II Denmark, a group of young German POWs are forced to clear a beach of thousands of land mines under the watch of a Danish Sergeant who slowly learns to appreciate their plight.

name: Verónica
summary_text: Madrid, 1991. A teen girl finds herself besieged by an evil supernatural force after she played Ouija with two classmates.

name: The Salvation
summary_text: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

name: Man Bites Dog
summary_text: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.

name: The Secret of NIMH
summary_text: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

name: Middle Men
summary_text: Chronicles Jack Harris, one of the pioneers of internet commerce, as he wrestles with his morals, and struggles not to drown in a sea of con men, mobsters, drug addicts, and porn stars.

name: Love & Mercy
summary_text: In the 60s, Beach Boys leader Brian Wilson struggles with emerging psychosis as he attempts to craft his avant-garde pop masterpiece. In the 80s, he is a broken, confused man under the 24-hour watch of shady therapist Dr. Eugene Landy.

name: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
summary_text: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

name: The Verdict
summary_text: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

name: Boy A
summary_text: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a violent crime he committed as a child.

name: Child's Play 3
summary_text: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

name: Chasing Liberty
summary_text: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

name: Promised Land
summary_text: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.

name: We Are Your Friends
summary_text: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
summary_text: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

name: The Time Machine
summary_text: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

name: Official Secrets
summary_text: The true story of a British whistleblower who leaked information to the press about an illegal NSA spy operation designed to push the UN Security Council into sanctioning the 2003 invasion of Iraq.

name: Peter Rabbit
summary_text: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

name: Old Dogs
summary_text: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead them to be the temporary guardians of seven year-old twins.

name: Dear Zindagi
summary_text: Kaira is a budding cinematographer in search of a perfect life. Her encounter with Jug, an unconventional thinker, helps her gain a new perspective on life. She discovers that happiness is all about finding comfort in life's imperfections.

name: Zulu
summary_text: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

name: The One I Love
summary_text: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.

name: Nothing But the Truth
summary_text: In Washington, D.C., a reporter faces a possible jail sentence for outing a CIA agent and refusing to reveal her source.

name: Summer of Sam
summary_text: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

name: Plan 9 from Outer Space
summary_text: Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth, the lives of the living are in danger.

name: Up in Smoke
summary_text: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

name: The Garden of Words
summary_text: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

name: Love and Death
summary_text: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.

name: Kicking & Screaming
summary_text: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating.

name: Wild Target
summary_text: A hitman tries to retire, but a beautiful thief may change his plans.

name: V/H/S/2
summary_text: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

name: Emma
summary_text: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

name: It Could Happen to You
summary_text: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

name: Brief Encounter
summary_text: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

name: Mustang
summary_text: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.

name: Apt Pupil
summary_text: A boy blackmails his neighbor after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

name: John Dies at the End
summary_text: A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return no longer human. Can two college drop-outs save humanity from this silent, otherworldly invasion?

name: Liberal Arts
summary_text: When 30-something Jesse returns to his alma mater for a professor's retirement party, he falls for Zibby, a college student, and is faced with a powerful attraction that springs up between them.

name: Greenberg
summary_text: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.

name: The Baader Meinhof Complex
summary_text: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.
